mendel.dht.partition

Class SHA1Partitioner

  • java.lang.Object
    • mendel.dht.partition.Partitioner<Metadata>
      • mendel.dht.partition.SHA1Partitioner

  • public class SHA1Partitioner
extends Partitioner<Metadata>
    Partition using a vantage point tree as a similarity based hash. To be used as a primary hash function to hash data into groups.
    Author:
    ctolooee

    • Method Detail

      • locateData

        public NodeInfo locateData(Metadata metadata)
                    throws HashException,
                           PartitionException
        Description copied from class: Partitioner
        Determines where a file belongs in the system based on its properties. This function could implement a simple hash-based partitioning scheme, something more dynamic.

        Ultimately, this function will determine the DHT hierarchy.

        Specified by:
        locateData in class Partitioner<Metadata>
        Parameters:
        metadata - data to find the location in the network for.
        Throws:
        HashException
        PartitionException
